pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ tīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr2.4:1.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
